channel.title: No Where to Hide - Unincorporated (Playtest)
channel.description:
CONTENT WARNING: Small town small mindedness, drugs, abuse, abuse of power, feeling trapped.
DESCRIPTION: This will be a one-shot of Unincorporated which is currently being playtested. Unincorporated is a game by Bethany Harvey about being stuck together in a small community with a limited pool of other people. The characters are ordinary people caught up in petty dramas, grudges, and hopeless love affairs, while trying to shake off the weight of their reputations and define who they are for themselves. This is a GMless game.
SPECIAL REQUEST: Saving one spot for a new (last six months) Gauntlet member. DM me on Slack.
RSVP OPEN ACCESS TIME: 05/17/2021 19:00 PDT
NUMBER OF SESSIONS: (Example - There will be 3 sessions in total. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.)
DURATION: 3.5 hours
NUMBER OF PLAYERS: 4 total including myself.
SAFETY TOOLS IN USE: Lines & Veils, X-Card, and the Open Door Policy. The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct will also be in effect. (https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html). All games should follow this.).
SET UP INFO: Streamyard, Google Drawing
BREAKS: 10 minutes on the hour
RECORDED: Yes with permission.
PRIOR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: No, rules will be taught in play.
SESSION LINK:https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M_d7oCpbm5PH5MSFsCl
